thread.title: Build your own Lightwave Discovery Edition in a few minutes

post.date: Posted: Sun Apr 20, 2003 7:08 am Post subject: Build your own Lightwave Discovery Edition in a few minutes
post.author: BNA!
post.body:
NEWTEK appears to have a hard time shipping the discovery edition of Lightwave, let alone offering it for download.

Many people have tested this and it appears to be valid:

- Download the latest 7.5b Update
- Download the latest Sentinel Drivers (the hardware dongle you usually need to run the full version of lightwave)

Install both and the 7.5b Update should startup standalone as the Discovery Edition
Note that you need to install the sentinel drivers, but you don't need the hardware dongle itself!
